alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 3:53AM PST until January 30 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches above 4500 feet, with lighter amounts below. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County
